meanings.definition: Not in the form of a lyric.
meanings.sent1: The instrumental music was nonlyric, without any singing.
meanings.sent2: Her nonlyric poetry focused on nature and emotions.
meanings.sent3: The nonlyric dance performance left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: His nonlyric painting spoke volumes without words.
meanings.sent5: The nonlyric melody painted a vivid picture in my mind.

meanings.definition: Not relating to or characteristic of a lyric.
meanings.sent1: The nonlyric novel was full of action and suspense.
meanings.sent2: His nonlyric style of writing was direct and to the point.
meanings.sent3: The nonlyric movie soundtrack added a comedic touch to the scene.
meanings.sent4: Her nonlyric approach to storytelling was refreshing and unique.
meanings.sent5: The nonlyric tone of the speech made it memorable and impactful.
